00	ADD		Eb	Gb
01	ADD		Ev	Gv
02	ADD		Gb	Eb
03	ADD		Gv	Ev
04	ADD		AL	Ib
05	ADD		AX 	Iv
06	PUSH	ES
07	POP		ES
08	OR		Eb	Gb
09	OR		Ev	Gv
0A	OR		Gb	Eb
0B	OR		Gv	Ev
0C	OR		AL	Ib
0D	OR		AX 	Iv
0E	PUSH	CS
0F	--
10	ADC		Eb	Gb
11	ADC		Ev	Gv
12	ADC		Gb	Eb
13	ADC		Gv	Ev
14	ADC		AL	Ib
15	ADC		AX 	Iv

1B	SBB		Gv	Ev
1C	SBB		AL	Ib
1D	SBB		AX 	Iv
1E	PUSH	DS
1F	POP		DS
20	AND		Eb	Gb

23	AND		Gv	Ev

26	ES:
27	DAA

2E	CS:
2F	DAS

37	AAA

F0	LOCK

FD	STD
FE	GRP4	Eb
FF	GRP5	Ev


GRP1/0	ADD
GRP1/1	OR
GRP1/2	ADC
GRP1/3	SBB
GRP1/4	AND
GRP1/5	SUB
GRP1/6	XOR
GRP1/7	CMP
GRP2/0	ROL

GRP2/2	RCL
GRP2/3	RCR
GRP2/4	SHL
GRP2/5	SHR
GRP2/6	--
GRP2/7	SAR
GRP3a/0	TEST	Eb	Ib
GRP3a/1	--
GRP3a/2	NOT
GRP3a/3	NEG
GRP3a/4	MUL
GRP3a/5	IMUL
GRP3a/6	DIV
GRP3a/7	IDIV

GRP3b/2	NOT
GRP3b/3	NEG
GRP3b/4	MUL
GRP3b/5	IMUL
GRP3b/6	DIV
GRP3b/7	IDIV

GRP4/1	DEC
GRP4/2	--
GRP4/3	--
GRP4/4	--
GRP4/5	--
GRP4/6	--
GRP4/7	--

GRP5/1	DEC
GRP5/2	CALL

GRP5/6	PUSH
